data.actual_result: Text field stays in view of only the beginning of the Search's text field, forcing you to manually highlight your text to get to your current position
data.expected_result: Text field moves as you continue to type and expand the Search's text field so that you can see what you're typing
data.short_description: Search's text field doesn't move as you expand the field out of view
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Search in a channel - Begin typing enough to force Search to expand out of view and observe how the field doesn't move with you
